translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an internal object as condition there is an external object. With an internal object as condition there is an internal object. With an internal object as condition there is an external object.

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe dve pe avigate cha
translated: With an internal object as condition there is an external object. With an internal object as condition there is an internal object. With an internal object as condition there is an external object.
